about_the_game:
Meet the only DLC content that can make the original BoneTown look tame: the BoneTown Kinks DLC.

Do you only want just the Gay sex from the Kinks DLC? Then the Kinks Gay DLC is perfect thing for you. This DLC only includes the new gay sex, characters, levels, and competitions, and none of the other stuff.



Gay Mode allows you to bone the boys running around BoneTown. When activated, gay guys will appear around the world and if your balls are big enough, they’re all yours.



Bi-Sexual positions allow you to have a threesome with a guy and a girl at the same time.



Now when you strip down a girl in BoneTown, you have a chance of finding a sexy surprise: some girls are now wearing racy lingerie under their outfits.



Four new Gay sex positions allow the player to get down with the boys: Dick Suck, Missionary, Against the Wall, and Doggy. Plus, to make it more fun, in each position you can choose whether you want to be the pitcher or the catcher.



Three new interior levels are the hubs for the new kinks:

  • Planet Fill This Gym
  • The Broken Spoke Gay Bar
  • The Gore House BDSM Club



Two new Competitions will not only highlight all the new kinks, but also unlock some of the new sexual positions.



With the new interiors come 3 new character types: Bear Gay Guys, Gym People, and BDSM Participants.



The Kinks DLC is first time we’ve exposed all the clothing, voices, hair, body sizes, lingerie, dicks, and everything else that makes up our characters in single, easy to use places. But . . . this is a video game, so gaining access to all that great content’s got to be earned. You’ll unlock more options in each one of these customizers by completing the original game’s story-line as well as the new Kinks competitions.



Make your main character just how you want him. A stoner blinged out in gangster attire? A crackhead in a business suit with his dick hanging out? We don’t judge, it’s up to you.



Create the gay lover of your dreams and then bone him. From bears to twinks and everything in between, we got what you’re looking for.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes gay men dressed explicitly to totally naked, as well as explicit man on man sexual acts where the partners are able to swap having sex with each other in multiple sexual positions. None of the content is hidden and you are able to see everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 2800+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card supporting Pixel Shader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1GB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Experience all new types of sex. Gay sex, Threesomes and Bi-sexual gangbangs are only the beginning. And play the entire game in the new Gay Mode where you can have sex with guys.
